title: The Static Blanket
description: A static-electric storm is wreaking havoc in the laundry ward...

turns.narrative: The laundry ward is experiencing a 'Static-Storm'. The blankets are floating and snapping with blue arcs of lightning.
turns.convergence: The air smells of ozone and fresh linen. It feels like every hair on your body is being pulled by invisible fingers.

turns.narrative: A 'Static-Weaver'—a tiny spider made of blue silk and sparks—is 'Knitting' the laundry into a giant, electric web.
turns.convergence: The spider gives you a 'Blue-Silk-Scrap'—it can hold a charge of 50 volts.

turns.narrative: The 'Laundry-Master' is trapped under a 'Heated-Quilt' that is trying to 'Cook' him with mana-heat.
turns.convergence: The quilt becomes a 'Cooling-Cape'. The air in the ward drops twenty degrees in a second.

turns.narrative: You find a 'Logic-Fault' in the laundry's 'Steam-Press'—it’s been feeding on 'Warp-Static' from the atmosphere.
turns.convergence: The machine chitters and reveals it was 'Upgraded' by an unknown agent. (+1 Secret)

turns.narrative: A 'Static-Wraith'—a creature of blue sparks and white fabric—lunges from the dryer, its touch a painful electric shock.
turns.choice_b: Ground the wraith with a copper-wire
turns.convergence: The wraith dissolves into a pile of 'Clean-Linen'. The air feels remarkably fresh and clear. (+100 XP)

turns.narrative: The Laundry-Master gives you a 'Safety-Pin of Grounding'—it makes you immune to basic electric shocks.
turns.convergence: The pin is made of brass and glows when near high-voltage.

turns.narrative: The Static-Storm is over. The blankets are back on the racks, their scent a peaceful mix of pine and ozone.
turns.convergence: The sun rises over the ward, drying the last of the damp cloth in a golden, safe warmth.

turns.narrative: As you leave, you feel 'Charged' with energy. You can light a small candle with just a touch of your finger.
turns.convergence: The sensation is temporary, but it grants you a +1 to 'Tech-Save' for 24 hours.

turns.narrative: The Laundry-Master promises to 'Ground' all future loads. He offers you a 'Master's Apron' (+1 Defense).
turns.convergence: The Ridge-air feels cool and steady. No hair-raising feelings tonight.

turns.narrative: Quest ends in the Laundry. The 'Static Blanket' is a warm cover tonight.

conclusion: The mission regarding 'The Static Blanket' is complete. Quest Complete.

risk_matrix.penalty: You are flash-fried by a giant electric towel. (Quest Failed)
risk_matrix.critical_failure: The attempt failed quietly. The situation remains unresolved.

unlock_conditions.trigger: Laundry-ward reports blankets floating and sparking

permanent_effects.settlement: Laundry ward operational; steam-press anomaly logged
permanent_effects.world: Unknown agent tampering flagged as conspiracy clue

branching_outcomes.result: Sabotage evidence removed but power lost
